Page.name: P_Extra_Mana
Page.text: It can also be made randomly when creating potions
of mana or potions of spirit restoration.
30 Ogre Toes, 15 Potions of Spirit Restoration,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
1 Binding stone, 2 Potions of Spirit Restoration.

Page.name: P_Extra_Life
Page.text: It can also be made randomly when creating potions
of minor healing or potions of body restoration.
1 Binding stone, 2 Potions of Body Restoration.

Page.name: P_Antidote
Page.text: Removes any current poison from your body.
1 Empty Vial, 3 Rues, 10 Yarrows, 3 Poppies, 4 Ale.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_TS
Page.text: Allows you to see invisible characters.
(30% chance of temporarily reducing your attack
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of True Sight

Page.name: P_Invis
Page.text: Make your character invisible, except to those
1 Empty Vial, 2 Ales, 2 Snow Leopard Furs, 7 Wormwoods
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Accuracy
Page.text: Temporarily increases your ability to aim attacks.
1 Empty Vial, 3 Skunk Furs, 5 Valerians, 15 Dandelions,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Evasion
Page.text: Temporarily increases your ability to evade attacks.

Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
